name: MTLDeviceNotificationName
desc: The notifications posted when a GPU supported by Metal is added to or removed from the system.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Returns a new device notification name from a specified raw value.

items.name: static let wasAdded: MTLDeviceNotificationName
items.desc: A notification posted when a GPU is added to the system.

items.name: static let removalRequested: MTLDeviceNotificationName
items.desc: A notification posted when the user indicates that a GPU will be removed from the system.

items.name: static let wasRemoved: MTLDeviceNotificationName
items.desc: A notification posted when a GPU is removed from the system.
